content: hat all rights reserved dsires on ravelry magic loop instructions what is the magic loop it is a technique using a long circular needle to knit any circumference in the round i love the magic loop and i m sure you will too once you become familiar with it it s convenient and will save you a lot of money instead of buying circular needles of all different lengths plus the double pointed needles to go along with them you will only have to buy one circular per size of needle you are using no more dropping double pointed needles down the inside of your couch i use addi lace 47 circular because it has a great flexible cable and the points are fast and quiet any circular needle over 36 will work 1 cast on like you normally would please note for illustrative purposes cable with a 36 or longer circular needle shown is much shorter than actual cable 2 slide stitches to center of cable find the center and gently bend the cable and pull the loop out of the stitches do not crimp your cable back needle important working yarn should be in front of back cable front working needle 3 face the needles to the right and push the stitches up on the needles make sure the stitches are not twisted you are now in the ready position with the working yarn coming off the back needle in front of the cable pull the back needle out and to the right so tips of needles touch adjust the loop of cable so that it is equal on both sides yarn should be in back needle front of back cable ready position 4 make sure the stitches are not twisted and begin knitting you may want to place a marker at beginning of round one or two stitches in work across all stitches and when the left hand needle is empty simply let go and drop it needles in front cable in back drop left needle 1 magic loop instructions ©2014 donna sires all rights reserved dsires on ravelry 5 pinch the stitches on the end of the needle so they don t fall off and rotate your work so the needle with the stitches is in the back facing right push the front needle back or pull on the cable so the stitches are on it and align the points you are now in the ready position again back needle ready position 6 pull the back needle out and to the right so tips of needles touch adjust the loop of cable so that it is equal on both sides you are now ready to knit the second half of your round yarn should be in front of back
